channel.title: Authors on Connor Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Connor Lin

item.description:
I am a software engineer at Google Daydream working on exciting projects in computer graphics and VR/AR!

Previously, I was a graduate student at Carnegie Mellon University, advised by Keenan Crane. As a member of the CMU Graphics Lab and the CMU Geometry Collective, I researched interesting problems in computer graphics and geometry processing. This culminated in my Master’s Thesis on remeshing geometric surfaces!

I also completed my undergraduate studies at Carnegie Mellon, majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Robotics. Outside of work, I enjoy watching movies, playing video/boardgames with friends, and listening to music (long-time swiftie).
